page.title: 10Law and Order
page.content: Although National Statistics show that crime is on the increase, in Dereham it seems the Police have most crime under control. Dereham Police Station has four policemen actually on the beat in the town,there are also mobile police officers, but they deal with the surrounding area as well as assisting the local police if required. There is also a civilian administration staff of thirteen, and two traffic wardens which also work at Swaffham and Watton. The Probation Service with its staff of four has an office adjacent to the Magistrates Court in the Towns Assembly Rooms. Fourteen Magistrates deal with minor crimes each Friday with the Juvenile Court fortnightly on Wednesdays.
